english.segment1: Hearts aren't really our guides. We are truly alone. 'Cause God ain't up in the sky, Holding together our bones.
english.segment2: Remember we used to speak. Now I'm starting to think, Your voice was really my own, Bouncing off the ceiling back to me.
english.segment3: God, this can't be. God, this can't be, God, could it be that all we see is it?
english.segment4: Come down, heaven. Won't you come down?. Won't you cut through the clouds?. Won't you come down?
english.segment5: Oh, my heaven, why do you have doors to close?. Do you have clouds to stop his voice on the way down?
english.segment6: God, this can't be. God, this can't be, God, could it be that all we see is it?
english.segment7: God, does grace reach to this side of madness?. 'Cause I know this can't be, The great peace we all seek.
english.segment8: Come down, heaven. Won't you come down?. Won't you cut through the clouds?. Won't you come down?.
